main event: A UFO was observed in Rural Hall, North Carolina on May 17, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared round and similar to a small aircraft., It emitted a bright orange light that pulsed over a 300-yard area., The object flew in a zig-zag pattern while an aircraft flew straight., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes with two confirmed witnesses., The final conclusion of the observation was determined as UNIDENTIFIED.
sighted object: round object with a bright orange light
